verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wait for the Lord, all you who are righteous,
Despise not the wicked for they have their reward.
Wait for the Lord, all you who are righteous,
Despise not the wicked for they have their reward.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And you shall ride on the heights of the earth,
And taste of things not seen or heard;
And you shall declare the greatness of the Lord,
Wait, oh wait for your reward.
